column4: in the menu layout gui there is a debian menu, how can I activate it and will it list programs not showing in the other menus?
ty but is it automatic afterwards? the readme is not very talkative
yes, anything packaged with a menu entry just shows up
will take a few mins after initial install to generate all the stuff, but then the Debian menu will be selectable and work
oh ok so it is automatic and there's nothing to launch to initiate it?
you just need to enable the Debian menu to be viewable, that's it
